titles.title: Brother, You Understand The Weak And The Tired

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Brother, you understand the weak and the tired,
You pray for the one that's afflicted,
You fight against the oppressor.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Sister, you understand the weak and the tired,
You pray for the one that's afflicted,
You fight against the oppressor.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines:
Don't faint, don't let the battle hold you back.
The Lord has called you, to care for the flock.
Don't faint, don't let the battle hold you back.
The Lord has called you, to care for the flock.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
There are green pastures, springs of everlasting waters.
Take up your staff and let the Lord use you.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
/ Hermano, tu que entiendes al débil y cansado,
Tu que horas por el afligido,
Tu que luchas contra el opresor. / (2x)

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Hay un lugar en nuestros corazones.
Ahí tu estas pastoreando el rebaño que el señor te ha dado.
/ No desmalles, ni dejes que las pruebas te detengan,
El señor te ha llamado a cuidar la red. / (2x)

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
/ Hay pastos verdes, hay manantiales de vida eterna.
Toma tu cayado y deja te usar por el señor. / (2x)
